Description:
To liaise and coordinate with the Client, Project Managers, Specialists appointed by Client and Contractors, while acting as the representative to the Design Consultant.
To ensure conformity of design intent by the Design Consultants for works.
To liaise with the Design Team on design and coordination issues.
